abstract: In the second trial over a device recalled in 2010, a jury rejected claims that the manufacturer inappropriately marketed a defective product.
snippet: In the second trial over a device recalled in 2010, a jury rejected claims that the manufacturer inappropriately marketed a defective product.
lead_paragraph: A jury in Chicago rejected claims on Tuesday that the orthopedics unit of Johnson & Johnson inappropriately marketed an artificial hip, which the company recalled in 2010.

headline.main: J.&J. Prevails in Defending Its Marketing of Hip Device
headline.print_headline: J.&J. Prevails In Defending Its Marketing Of Hip Device

abstract: The head of antitrust enforcement said he supported limiting the share of the airwaves suitable for wireless broadband that any provider could hold.
snippet: The head of antitrust enforcement said he supported limiting the share of the airwaves suitable for wireless broadband that any provider could hold.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The Justice Department’s top antitrust enforcer said on Tuesday that he supported limits on how much of the nation’s airwaves a single wireless company could hold, a condition that could keep AT&T and Verizon from bidding on certain blocks of airwaves during auctions.

headline.main: Justice Department Backs Limits on Wireless Companies
headline.print_headline: Justice Dept. Backs Limits On Wireless Companies
